text: (nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “meyama mage (rju) margayayi. ma (obava) allah desata aradhana karannemi. pæhædili sadhakayan kerehima mamada, mava anugamana karannanda sitinnemu. (samanayan ha sahayayangen ætva) allah itamat parisuddhavantayeki. ebævin (ohuta) samanayan tabannangen mamat keneku nova”
